column4: what is the point of that kind of spam?  they're not even advertising a product..
They enjoy being disruptive. Comment about it furthers that goal :(
if you end up in both without doing anything to cause that, your client presumably has both on autojoin.
#ubuntu is rather unusual in our use of #ubuntu-unregged; most channels on freenode aren't large enough or targetted by spam enough to need it.
